Posts.Content: Hi Penny, I had my diagnosis over a year ago, and sadly never lost any weight, biopsy can be a bit uncomfortable, but I took Arnica to help with the bruising as had breast and armpit biopsy so stopped me going black and blue, keep positive, the sooner you find out the better, best of luck and big hug Tracy xx
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Hi Chris, I was diagnosed over a year ago with primary breast cancer and secondaries in the bones and liver. Initially they gave me less than a year to live, happy to say have exceeded that, when I saw my consultant in January and asked what now? as I should have passed away, they told me that initially when they saw my ct results the 'team' had written me off in 12 weeks, the morale of the story never give up hope and stay positive. Chemo did shrink my largest liver tumor and the others remained the same size. They now class me as arrested and I wobble off and look forward to the future. I wish your sister every good wish and please stay positive it does help. Lots of love to you, Tracy xxx
